ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Everquest Marriage Questions......
ygData.msgSnippet: Well When I got Sk got married  I gave  the lady I was marrying  ingame the ring that drops of one of the mobs on the top floor of Tower of Frozen Shadow..
ygData.messageBody:
Well When I got Sk got married I gave the lady I was marrying ingame the
ring that drops of one of the mobs on the top floor of Tower of Frozen
Shadow.. Heck since most of the peeps that were there were guildies we
both got stuff that we had been wanting to upgrade our characters. Had some
really nice stuff too for the level we were at at the time. heck some of
the guildies had everything Ineeded for my Sk's epic and they MQ'd it for
me for my wedding gift and then we went and helped my lady's char get her
stuff for her epic lOL was kinda fun seeing a Sk and a Ranger in their mid
30's have their epics lol

But if you are able to and you've heard your EQ Fiancee saying how much he
wants a particular item that would be a great wedding present.


Hope this helps


----- Original Message -----
From: "Meleficent Ouverts" <meleficent22@...>
To: <theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 08, 2002 11:20 AM
Subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Everquest Marriage Questions......


>
> Hmmm, he is quite a gentleman, i think this will be a wonderful
arrangement.
> But what you do you get for a wedding present?
> Melefante Mordoria/Ranger/ 24
>
